It was a film about two people who live in a small town in the middle of nowhere trying to make sense of what's going on in their lives. At the end, one of them is killed and they are left with no choice but to leave the city. The rest of us have no idea what happened to them or why they chose to stay. If you look closely at the film, you'll see that it isn't just a bunch of people living happily ever after, but a series of events that lead to the death of several others. There are also lots of subplots, such as the murder of a girl by her boyfriend and the kidnapping of an elderly man by his girlfriend. Some of these sub-plats are actually very interesting, like the story of how the two men found each other and how they ended up in New York City together.
